author: VnW Travels
comment: A great app that we were able to start using straight away. Really liked the ability to save favourite places and the detailed written breakdown of the chosen route with interactive map to keep you on course. It made travel in Barcelona stress free.

author: Prasad Adhav
comment: The app is really good. You get the routes on map, bus stops, all the buses going through that bus stop. It also tells the expected arrival time. The only  drawback is it needs net access.

reply.author: webmaster TMB
reply.content:
Hi Prasad,
The app needs Internet access because the arrivals are displayed in real time. 
Best wishes,
Marta - Customer service

comment: A public information app that forces you to sign up. Genius. And no, I don't want a "personalized experience" to just see the maps and the route planner does not need to know anything about me besides the origin and destination. Uninstalled.

reply.author: webmaster TMB
reply.content:
Our app is more than just a list of routes and bus and metro lines, that's why we ask for your registration. You can choose your favourite lines, stops and stations and find personalised information according to your preferences. You can also check whether there are any incidents on your favourite lines directly.
Marta - Customer service

author: Quintie Bouwens
comment: Una kk. No funciona. Te obliga a registrarte y te lleva a una página web que no funciona. No he conseguido que funcione. Lo desistalo sin haberlo podido usar.

reply.author: webmaster TMB
reply.content:
La app solicita el registro para ofrecerte un servicio personalizado. Si no te has registrado en la aplicación social, cuando entras a través del login social te pide los datos. Si sigues teniendo problemas, contacta con nosotros: https://www.tmb.cat/es/atencion-al-cliente/contacto/email.
Saludos,
Marta - Servicio atención al cliente

author: Xavier Massot Vidal
comment: No entenc perquè m'he de donar d'alta per consultar horaris. Penós. Desinstal·lada immediatament, apa...

reply.author: webmaster TMB
reply.content:
Hola Xavier,
el registre és necessari per accedir a les rutes i línies de bus i metro favorites des de qualsevol dispositiu. Igualment, el registre et permet participar a promocions d'oci i cultura i d'altres avantatges exclusius. De totes maneres, la tens disponible de manera genèrica a tmb.cat sense registre.
Marta - Servei d'atenció al client

author: Johannes Mager
comment: dont buy the online voucher! you need to print it at a ticket vending machine anyway. no departure times on routes visible! use google maps instead....

author: Matthew Wilkes
comment: Mandatory sign up

author: Simin Zuo
comment: I bought two tickets from this app. But I cannot print it and no purchasing information is stored in the app. No email was sent to my phone. I had to buy two new tickets from the Metro office. Even the customer service refused to reply my phone. I cannot get back my money!!

reply.author: webmaster TMB
reply.content:
Hi Simin, the app is free, so you might be talking about another service. Please fill in this form to give us more detailed information so we can help you: https://www.tmb.cat/en/customer-services/contact/email.
Best regards,
Marta - Customer Service

comment: One of the worst public transport apps I have seen so far.  - To use it one needs to register on an unknown website - why ?! Please, please developers study the Android API to use a local or cloud-synced storage for data and don grab the users email for a useless account.  - It is nearly impossible to plan a journey with a target address as the "adress replacement" functionality simply does not work - one will end up in a endless loop in the app.  - Metro sems not to be included - why not?  I don't understand why this app is so bad, their website is much better and especially provides all options for a good journey planning.

author: Marco Ceresa
comment: Mandatory sign up?? Ridiculous. Uninstalled immediately.

author: Ioan-Lucian Crisan
comment: Useless, just grabs your personal information.

author: Mash Sapphire
comment: Mug lento

author: Domenico Rella
comment: why should i need username and password? this is a public service, isn't it?

author: daniel brown
comment: Muy lento. No fuciona.

author: Chad Lüstig
comment: Una app obligatoria para una Smart city. El tiempo que pone para espera de buses suele ser acertado en un ~90% de las veces

author: Vicky González
comment: Tengo la app en español y me he encontrado con cosas como "bitlletes" y frases sin traducir del catalán en el apartado de "billetes y tarifas".
title: Errores de traducción

author: Anatole Miriouk
comment: Easier to look on the map than to use this app. It doesn't make traveling easier in already complicated transport system of Barcelona
title: Inefficient

author: Juan Carlos Lopez Artigas
comment: Para una semana que el servicio de notificaciones debe funcionar, llegan pero no se muestran en la pantalla de mis notificaciones. Arreglarlo para futuras huelgas...

author: Maria Andreina Franceschi
comment: No incluye el Nit bus y me parece que es necesario. Lo uso para ir al trabajo y no logro sincronizar del todo mi tiempo por esto de no saber con cierto grado de certeza cuando llega a la parada
title: Util, pero

author: Frederik De Vriese
comment: Useless app
title: Crashes

author: Ignasi Giró Huber
comment: No vull registrar-me!

author: xaviaru
comment: Des de que l'heu actualitzat es tanca automàticament sense poder veure els horaris ni algunes opcions.                 It crashes all the time with no chance to check the timetable or even choose other options.
title: Es tanca / Crashes

author: pushkar kulkarni
comment: Thanks for this app, it is good and easy to use. It was nice experience for me when I was in Barcelona. Keep it up
title: Easy to use, nice

author: Márk SZALAI
comment: Time tables are not available in english. Please fix this issue.
title: English

author: Can Güney Aksakallı
comment: Just terrible

author: Chuck LeDuc Díaz
comment: Sí tuviera mapa tendría utilidad, pero así no vale ni el espacio en el móvil.
title: No map. No tiene mapa.

author: Mariangel Pereira
comment: V useful!

author: !Paweł¡ Pawel
comment: Tried to get route planner from El Poble Sec to Camp Nou....  It wanted make me to  go trough Sagrada Familia. Terrible. 😲
title: From A to B, like a sightseeing

author: manu Manu
comment: Gran app. Muy util
title: Gran app

author: William Stuart
comment: Can not open app.  Will not let me in. Tells me that I am not an active user!
title: App?

author: Daniel Palacín
comment: Podrían poner el tiempo real que falta para que llegue el metro a la estación o el bus a la patadar, y eso de que te diga como se llega,  la verdad es que lo hace muchísimo mejor el Google Maps... Una vergüenza.
title: Pésima

author: Rodrigo García Cilleruelo
comment: No funciona mai, es queda sempre actualitzant dades i les dades no arriben
title: Deplorable

author: enricalacalle
comment: Es imposible que funcione sin que se cierre por crash. Incapaz de ver nunguna informacion. Vaya panda de incompetentes.
title: Horrible

author: Jacques Movil
comment: La aplicación cada 2 por 3 borra los favoritos que he creado. Además no entiendo porqué solamente puedo tener lineas como favorito y no paradas. En fin. Quedan cosas por mejorar.
title: Favoritos

author: Eliana Gialain
comment: Porque cambiar algo si estaba bueno? La versión anterior era mucho mejor. Esa versión es horrible. El menu es confuso y obliga a repetir pasos. Casi nunca funciona para informar el status de llegada de los buses. Constantemente las preferencias son perdidas.
title: La versión anterior era mucho mejor

author: Raffaele G
comment: En mi móvil esta versión es muy lenta, seleccionar puntos manualmente en el mapa se cuelga y te obliga a registrarte
title: Mejor la version anterior

author: Andreu Pinel
comment: Per a un servei de merda,  més que informar, desinforma, i ara t'has de registrar per veure les incidències, sona a acudit, dels dolents, però no ho és. A nivell tècnic no tinc queixa.
title: Aplicació decent ...

comment: Worst planner ever... and mailbox full of spam. Can't recommend.
title: Rubbish

author: Silvia Ramos
comment: Se cuelga constantemente... es mas complicado buscar las paradas que antes... para los tiempos de espera casi nunca funciona! Mejor la version anterior!
title: Casi nunca funciona!

author: Lluis Hernandez
comment: Era mejor la versión anterior
